TitleEnglish: Donten: Laughing Under the Clouds - Gaiden: Chapter 1 - One Year After the Battle
SummaryEnglish: One year has passed after the great battle against the Orochi (gigantic snake). Kumou Tenka had been paralyzed from the final battle and he took part of the governmentâ€™s human experiment before the battle. Tenka withdrew himself from society but his younger brothers Soramaru and Chutaro find out the secret past about their older brother.
